tool_description: Cross-references in-text citations with bibliography entries to identify missing references, orphaned entries, and matching inconsistencies.

in_text_citations.description: Array of in-text citation keys or references

citation_style.description: Citation style format for matching logic

fuzzy_matching.description: Enable fuzzy matching for potential matches

error_messages: Empty citation arrays: Both in_text_citations and bibliography_entries must contain at least one item.
Unsupported citation style: Use one of [APA, MLA, Chicago, IEEE, Harvard, Vancouver].
Invalid match threshold: Value must be between 0 and 1.
Cross-referencing failed: Unable to process citation matching due to format issues.
usage: Provide arrays of in-text citations and bibliography entries along with citation style to identify matching issues and orphaned references.

matched_pairs.description: Number of successfully matched citation pairs

unmatched_in_text.description: In-text citations without corresponding bibliography entries

orphaned_bibliography.description: Bibliography entries not referenced in text
